About Me

Hi there!

I am a final year undergraduate from Nanyang Technological University, majoring in Information Engineering and Media.

My passions lie in both tech and art, and my works include web & mobile development, game development as well as UI/UX design.

If you liked my works, let's get in touch!

Languages
Fluent in English and Chinese (Mandarin)
Software Development
HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Jekyll, Vue.Js, Node.Js, jQuery, NativeScript, SQL, PHP, MongoDB, SQL, C#, Java, GIT
Software Applications
Unity3D, Android Studio, Figma, GIMP, Microsoft Office 2019 (Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Outlook), Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Procreate, Autodesk Inventor Professional
